node.title: Paine back on the field, and appealing for Test selection as sexting scandal rolls on
node.alt: A group of cricketers celebrate on the field as a batter walks off
node.description: Former Australian Test captain Tim Paine is back behind the stumps in his first game in months, as the sexting scandal which cost him the role continues to play out.
node.content:
["Former Australian Test cricket captain Tim Paine is back behind the stumps\u00a0in his first game in months, as the sexting scandal which cost him the role continues to play\u00a0out.", "Paine is lining up for the Tasmanian Tigers\u00a02nd XI against South Australia 2nd XI in Hobart.\u00a0", "It's the wicketkeeper's first competitive match in six months, after his scheduled club match on Saturday was abandoned due to rain.", "He has been on the sidelines since having neck surgery.", "Paine stood down as Australia's men's Test captain on Friday after it was revealed he had been involved in a text message exchange with a female employee of Cricket Tasmania in late 2017.", "", "
Tim Paine has made his return to the field for Tasmania after six months recovering from injury.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "Cricket Australia confirmed it had investigated the incident in 2018 and cleared Paine of any breach of the code of conduct.", "Cricket Tasmania's general manager of high performance, Simon Insley, said Paine was just \"happy to play cricket\".\u00a0", "\"He's ready to go,\" he said.", "\"He's probably been frustrated that he's been held back by the medical staff a little bit.", "\"But this has been planned for many months now \u2014 that he would return to 2nd XI\u00a0cricket and get some days in the middle before the internal [Test squad selection] games on the Gold Coast.\"", "Paine is hoping to get some valuable time in the middle during the four-day game against South Australia.", "\"I think he's ready to be around his friends and his teammates.", "", "
Tim Paine\u00a0and wife Bonnie at the Allan Border Medal award ceremony in 2018.(AAP Image/David Crosling)
", "Paine is using the match to prove his readiness for selection in the Ashes.\u00a0", "\"That's why he's here playing cricket, he wants to make sure he shows signs of good form and show that he's ready for selection,\" Insley said.\u00a0", "\"This has been a very calculated return to cricket, so if there were any concerns on his fitness he wouldn't be playing a 2nd\u00a0XI\u00a0game\u00a0", "\"He felt he's been ready for a long period of time.\"", "", "
Paine's teammates have been supportive in the wake of the scandal.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "Insley said the sexting scandal had\u00a0not had any impact on the team's morale.", "\"[They]\u00a0are ready to get around Tim,\" he said.", "\"They are excited to play with Tim Paine regardless of what's happened in the past few days, so they're excited to support their friend and play cricket with one of their colleagues.\"", "Paine is not captaining the side in Hobart, with the role being taken by Mitch Owen."]
